convo.convoLine: There's no proof of any of it.  I just destroyed it.
Did you bring the flash drive?
Hey Stephanie.  I didn't know you'd be coming too.
Here, can you watch my stuff for a second?  Iâ€¦ need to... hit the restroom.
Huh, so you did bring it.
I was protecting Terry.  It had proof that she was involved in dumping the Exceleron.
Terry, listen... I'm sorry.  Can you just talk to them?
You can't do this!  If I go down, you go down . . . Maybe you've heard, they've got laws against blackmail.
Terry, you've got to do something here, I'm your brother!
